FROM alpine:3.11 AS base-dev
RUN echo dev > /hi
SAVE FILES [/hi] /kaniko/deps/0
CLEAN

FROM alpine:3.11 AS base-prod
RUN echo prod > /hi
SAVE FILES [/hi] /kaniko/deps/1
CLEAN

FROM alpine:3.11
COPY --from=base-dev /hi /finalhidev
COPY --from=base-prod /hi /finalhiprod
RUN cat /finalhidev
RUN cat /finalhiprod
